configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.
configuration.name: Filter null values from the response

configuration.description: ExactTartget Time of Getting Token or Performing Authentication
configuration.name: Time of Getting Token or Performing Authentication

description: Add a Salesforce Marketing Cloud Instance to connect your existing Salesforce Marketing Cloud account to the Marketing Hub, allowing you to manage activities, campaigns, and contacts across multiple Marketing Elements and other Salesforce services. You will need your Salesforce Marketing Cloud account information to add an instance.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of pages to retrieve. The default is 1.

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Specify how to order the interactions. Valid ordering columns are: ModifiedDate (default), Name, Performance. Valid values are: DESC, ASC. The default is 'ModifiedDate DESC'.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of results to return on a page. The default and maximum is 50.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The JSON body to create an activity (interaction)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON Body to update the interaction . In JSON body key is mandatory and modified date must match the current Database value from Marketing Cloud

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the interaction to delete expressed in the form of a GUID (UUID)

parameters.name: versionNumber
parameters.description: Version number of the interaction to delete. If no version is specified, ALL versions associated with the provided ID will be deleted.

parameters.name: versionNumber
parameters.description: Version number of the interaction to retrieve. Default is 1.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the object to retrieve from the Marketing Automation system.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Defines the order of the data (Default value of ModifiedDate DESC).

parameters.name: campaign
parameters.description: Json body  for creating new campaign.eg JSON {"name": "Annual Sale 2012","description": "Yearly sale","campaignCode": "annual2012", "color": "0000ff","favorite": false }

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign to delete in the Marketing Automation system.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign to retrieve from the Marketing Automation system.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression, used to search for provided attributes. If there are spaces in the attribute you need to include the backtick. For example: where=\`Email Addresses.Email Address\` = 'email@example.com'

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Json body to create the new contacts. eg{     "contactKey": "acruz@example.com",     "attributeSets": [{ "name": "MobileConnect Demographics" ,"items": [{"values": [{ "name": "Mobile Number", "value": "317-531-5555"},{ "name": "Locale","value": "US" },{ "name": "Status", "value": 1}] }] }]}

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The whatever ID

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The contact json body . e.g updated JSON{"contactKey": "acruz@example.com",     "attributeSets": [ "name": "MobilePush Demographics", "items": [ "values": [{ "name": "Device ID","value": 958405948},{ "name": "Application","value": 958405948 }]}]}] }

resources.description: Create a new campaign in the Marketing Automation service. Campaign creation will flow through Cloud Elements to your Marketing Automation service. With the exception of the 'id' field, the required fields indicated in the 'Campaign' model are those required to create a new campaign.

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description:
The campaign object to be created.
With the exception of the 'id' field, the required fields indicated in the 'Campaign' model are those required to create a new campaign.

name: Salesforce Marketing Cloud
